backend/main.mo: Defines actor state for suit stats, module toggles, environmental hazards, and system subsystems with initial values.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports linking HUD tab-bar updates and compact mode features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions providing color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting PWA metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker enabling offline caching, versioned cache cleanup, and network fallback behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling boot sequence, display modes, tab navigation, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Centralized audio bus providing safe SFX and voice playback with autoplay-unlock logic and layered alert handling.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: Provides HEV-style voice playback helpers that trigger specific audio lines when voice is enabled.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: Defines UI sound effect helpers that play short SFX when interactions occur if voice/SFX is enabled.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Renders an ambience audio player with playlist controls, volume, looping, and custom track upload.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Runs a staged boot animation with typing effects, progress, and audio cues before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/common/HudSwitch: Thin wrapper around a Switch component adding HUD styling and pass-through props.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays environmental hazard levels with icons, status text, and color-coded severity classes.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudGlobalEff: Renders global HUD visual effects like bloom, critical flash, and presence glow respecting motion settings.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: Main HUD container handling scaling, orientation, effects, and global header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Shows a warning overlay indicating that the HUD system is offline.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudTabsBar.t: Creates the HUD tab bar with icons and dynamic status indicators for suit, hazards, weapons, and settings.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Renders a minimal HUD showing core suit stats and a button to restore the standard display mode.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Provides reusable HUD panels including stat displays, meters, and vitals grouping with status logic.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Defines the tactical HUD layout with top, side, and bottom modules plus embedded stat panels and reticle.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Displays an overlaid tactical frame with corner indicators, reticle, and various tactical readouts.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with history navigation and command execution logging.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Shows a confirmation dialog modal for critical actions with confirm and cancel handlers.
frontend/src/components/info/OperatorPro: Displays static operator profile information in a HUD-styled panel.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Shows suit subsystem statuses and allows toggling voice, radio, HUD, and display mode with confirmations.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Renders the system log entries with timestamps inside a scrollable area.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Displays a suit schematic image with color-coded health, armor, and limb overlays based on provided values.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalI: Renders multiple interactive medical panels allowing toggling of neural and advanced medical system states with logging.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Shows vital signs and trauma metrics derived from suit and hazard store health values.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/E: Provides controls and status readouts for the SOS system, including arming, spoofing, and test burst actions.
frontend/src/components/medical/panels/L: Displays integrity, load, fracture risk, and calibration controls for each limb with dynamic status coloring.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Draws an animated radar sweep with deterministic contacts on a canvas and displays basic range info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoUiScale.ts: Provides a hook that calculates and updates a responsive UI scale based on viewport width.
frontend/src/hooks/useHudPresence.ts: Tracks pointer/touch movement and updates CSS variables for HUD effects using throttled animation frames.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query hooks for fetching and mutating suit stats and module states via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion based on a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: Detects and updates device orientation state using resize, orientationchange, and matchMedia events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, HEV-inspired color variables, HUD themes, and custom switch styling.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Parses console-style commands to update suit state, hazards, modules, and logs with various actions.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Exports a set of monochrome Unicode glyphs for HUD hazard and status indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Defines a Zustand store for audio playback with playlist management, controls, and initialization.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels to toggle critical flashing and trigger throttled alert voice lines.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store tracking per-hazard levels with setters, aggregate calculation, status mapping, and reset.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Holds UI and HUD settings with update actions and a reset function.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Tracks suit stats and module toggles with clamped setters and a reset action.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Maintains a list of log entries with an add-entry function and a clear method.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Stores UI landscape mode state with a toggle and reset.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Stores weapon system selections with setters and a reset action.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: UI tab rendering core stats, hazard panel, and vitals using suit store data.
frontend/src/tabs/HazardsTab.tsx: Provides an interactive hazard breakdown UI with filters, trends, and environmental readouts.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: Displays operator profile, subsystem readouts, system log, and command console.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: Renders medical readouts and interactive medical panels.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Settings UI for HUD, display, voice, and system resets with linked store actions.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Renders the tactical tab UI with radar, readouts, and a contact list using multiple HUD panel components.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: Displays suit module toggles and an ambience player, handling module state updates with audio feedback.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: Provides a weapons interface where users can view weapon data and interact with collapsible weapon details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended theme values, custom colors, and animation/typography plugins.
